QueryResult.text: SELECT wv.transno transaction_key, wv.actualcost actual_cost_rate, wv.totalcost actual_cost, wv.billrate revenue_rate, wv.totalamount revenue, wv.currency_type FROM ppa_wip_values wv WHERE wv.currency_type IN ('HOME','BILLING') AND wv.transno >= (SELECT record_key FROM dwh_tmp_record_keys)
